DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate efficacy Everolimus combination tacrolimus versus standard immunosuppressive regimen concern kidney function liver transplant recipient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Everolimus Combination With Tacrolimus Liver Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female recipient fullsize liver allograft , age 18 65 year . Exclusion criterion : Patients thrombocytopenia ( platelet < 50,000/mm³ ) , absolute neutrophil count < 1,000/mm³ leucopenia ( leucocytes < 2000/mm³ ) , anemia Hb < 8g/dl time screen Patients uncontrolled hypercholesterolemia ( > 350mg/dL ; > 9mmol/L ) hypertriglyceridemia ( > 750 mg/dL ; > 8.5 mmol/L ) time screen History malignancy organ system within past 5 year whether evidence local recurrence metastasis , nonmetastatic basal squamous cell carcinoma skin HCC ( see next criterion ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
